In Tweets: Live and Loud 2013

06/10/2013

Live and Loud was just that, and drew a massive reaction online. Here's the best of tweets from the Hes Eastern front

Image by

By undefined undefined

A new generation of tweeps have hit the ground running this Freshers' Week. Now they turned their discerning commentary to Live and Loud, the official Freshers' Ball. This year it moved to Hes East, a venue much more suited to the festival atmosphere that infused the night. With fireworks, giant spinny-projections, a silent disco and of course all the top acts on stage Live and Loud went off with a bang that bodes well for all the campus events to come. To kick off on our tour of #LiveandLoud, some pretty legit pre-event requests.

#LiveandLoud tonight! hope it's good and not too cold

— Grace (@GraceJones_) October 5, 2013
Stamina MC en route...

Over to York for #LIVEandLOUD at the @YorkUniSU with @ShyFX this evening; @PigeonsOfficial & @KatyB also play. :)

— Stamina MC (@StaminaMC) October 5, 2013
Festival times.

Feels so weird getting ready for a night out then putting on a pair of wellies and a mac #liveandloud

— Jemma Donington (@JemmaDonington) October 5, 2013
Talking of festivals, Glasto ain't got nothing. And we're pretty sure the Live and Loud cups-on-floor count can match Somerset's finest.

@yorkunisu #liveandloud sold out before Glastonbury #justsaying

— Ben Vulliamy (@bvulliamy) October 6, 2013
The photos are coming - keep an eye on the site!

Photographing #LiveAndLoud for @yorknouse tonight. #UoYFreshers

— Agatha Torrance (@agathatorrance) October 5, 2013
Please say he's joking. He is? Okay, good.

It appears there is a gig on tonight! #LIVEandLOUD #YUSU @yorkunisu pic.twitter.com/asdwyJIuxq

— James Shaw (@JASApplications) October 5, 2013
After Freshers' Week a can or two wouldn't go amiss but...

Asked for 'a couple of redbulls' thank you @yorkunisu #LIVEandLOUD @mtwinstanley pic.twitter.com/VBQ0huNcd0

— Paul Bailey-Hague (@DJ_PBH) October 5, 2013
So much of this face paint style this week - loving it.

Ready for #LIVEandLOUD @yusuprez @yorkunisu [...] pic.twitter.com/U7JheMUOG7

— LauraSandland-Taylor (@LauraSandlandT) October 5, 2013
On this evidence she's guaranteed to make it into our Live and Loud photo album:

Photobombed every photo in my ugly ginger hat #liveandloud #frontrow #askmeificare

— lauren oliver-walsh (@Lo_walsh) October 5, 2013
Always feel for the person underneath in these situations:

Partying on shoulders #freshers #york #liveandloud #katyb http://t.co/C73Xeyx2NL

— faye lilly (@fayedonnison) October 6, 2013
YSTV were there as well! Sure there'll be footage online on their site:

Had a great time filming #LIVEandLOUD @UniOfYork @yorkunisu with my amazing crew from @ystv!! #nowfortheedit pic.twitter.com/0Vltyo6EsO

— Alex Buckley (@alexisinfinite) October 6, 2013
Katy B thought she was here for a boxing bout. Fortunately she had some decent songs to sing as a back-up plan.

Getting ready to step on stage at @yorkunisu #LIVEandLOUD pow pow

— KATY B (@KatyB) October 5, 2013
Someone not enjoying the Pigeon Detectives...

"I'd stick dynamite up his arse and detonate it" #liveandloud from Roz

— Andrew Mills (@kullu_mills) October 5, 2013
The more 'o's there are the better the night was? OooooooooooooooooK.

Last night was sooooo goooood! #LIVEandLOUD

— Anneli Suarez (@annelisuarez) October 6, 2013
Sssshhhh...

Live and quiet #liveandloud

— connoralmond (@connoralmond) October 5, 2013
We've all been here:

#LIVEandLOUD my drunken attempt at hashtagging fails miserably https://t.co/MuJxslOwAX

— Jake Helliwell (@jakeedmund) October 6, 2013
There must be a good story behind #jessthemess...

flat 4 [?] #yorkuni #freshers #liveandloud #katyb #jessthemess #blowfish #vodka #bulge http://t.co/VrwwJ81w5e

— Rebecca Hicks (@rebeccasdfghjk) October 6, 2013
Can't be pleasing everyone... Short, sharp, and to the point. At least he's honest

This is shit #liveandloud

— James Axford (@james_axford) October 5, 2013
Many many wristbands from this week.

Arm is growing with wristbands #wristbands #festival #freshers #liveandloud #york #university http://t.co/3SKpA9BI0c

— Lucy Harling (@lucieharling) October 5, 2013
We heard that if you touch celebrities (although we admit we might mean 'celebrity') you get special powers.

One of the greatest Next-Morning-Realisations ever: I rubbed @StaminaMC on the head last night #LIVEandLOUD #SorryNotSorry

— Henry (@Henry_Perks) October 6, 2013
This guy must have been in a dark place. If you're gonna go there, at least compliment the ducks!

The geese are getting pretty #LIVEandLOUD

— Andrew Mills (@kullu_mills) October 5, 2013
Not sure we understand this? Any ideas?

Singing cucumber to a Katy B song because it looks like we know the words. @Alexbowes3 #LiveandLoud

— Elizabeth Furber (@Furbface) October 5, 2013
We all like dancing like crazy idiots!

Dancing like a crazy idiot last night #liveandloud #freshers #festival http://t.co/OBrYW1C9GW

— Katharine Godfrey (@kaygodfrey_) October 6, 2013
Early night. Nawt:

So much for an early night...Tokyo here we come #liveandloud #afterparty

— Megan Darnell (@abcdarnell) October 5, 2013
We don't want to know what happened here. Gambling of this nature is... 'discouraged'.

#Liveandloud wooo Olivia lost a bet! pic.twitter.com/TP5XOo1l8t

— Anty Cole (@anty_cole) October 5, 2013
Geddit?

cracking view of the #liveandloud firework display from my house!

— Evie Cameron (@eviee_c) October 5, 2013
And here they are (not the most informative picture we'll admit):

Fireworks! #LIVEandLOUD pic.twitter.com/kQeXFrfTIg

— James Shaw (@JASApplications) October 5, 2013
Katy if you're reading this, I'm sure the uni can hook you up with Bethan's email address.

@KatyB after #liveandloud I WANT TO BE YOUR BFF OK?!?!?

— Bethan O'Donnell (@BethanODonnell) October 6, 2013
It wasn't just freshers who headed East - spare a thought for bedraggled third years. This one spent all day running round Freshers' Fair for the Looking Glass!

7 hours of Freshers' Fair and 3 hours stewarding #LIVEandLOUD, I'm not sure how I survived my first Freshers' week, let alone my third...

— Elisabeth Shuker (@ElisabethShuker) October 6, 2013
Yes to techno fists!

My techno fist was out in full force tonight #freshers #liveandloud

— Ellie Kissane (@elliekissane) October 6, 2013
Note to freshers: you've still got 89 weeks of uni fun to go. Don't sweat:

#LIVEandLOUD was so good tonight! Gutted freshers is almost over.

— Laura Ainsworth (@IKilledKermit) October 5, 2013
Look who it is!

Huge shout to all the @yorkunisu team @yusuprez #LIVEandLOUD was WILD! @KatyB #DJPBH pic.twitter.com/rU1VFUDLjL

— Paul Bailey-Hague (@DJ_PBH) October 5, 2013
There were a lot of shit phone pictures on Twitter. To give you an idea, this was probably the best:

Pigeon detectives were sick tonight #liveandloud pic.twitter.com/ZhjSjvLXPu

— Andrew Frost (@IamFrostie) October 5, 2013
This happened... Surprised the crowd had the strength hold him after Freshers' Week!

The lead singer of the pigeon detectives just stage dived at #liveandloud he's pretty insane...

— Grace Lievesley (@fearlessgracee) October 5, 2013
And there you have it. The Freshers' Week rollercoaster is over and we will soon capitulate to the inevitability of freshers' flu. So good luck with that.
